messages.title: STOP BREXIT
messages.content: Build a brighter future. Fight to stay in the EU, to protect our environment, preserve our safety, and promote peace.

messages.title: DEMAND BETTER FOR BRITAIN
messages.content: Lib Dems are the only party that have a clear, credible plan for the future of our country.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight to stay in the EU to protect the environment, safety, and promote peace.
A Liberal Democrat Government will plant 60 million trees a year and insulate all low-income homes by 2025.
Build a brighter future by stopping Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus across the UK.
Lib Dems will recruit 20,000 more teachers as part of an extra £10 billion a year for schools.
The Lib Dems will invest 35 billion pounds in health and social care over the next 5 years.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Conservatives are saying your vote will not count, only a vote for Boris Johnson or the Lib Dems will.

issues.brexitEurope: Fight to stay in the EU.
issues.economy: Invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus across the UK if Brexit is stopped.
issues.education: Recruit 20,000 more teachers as part of an extra £10 billion a year for schools.
issues.environment: Plant 60 million trees a year and insulate all low-income homes by 2025.
issues.health: Invest 35 billion pounds in health and social care over the next 5 years.

contactInformation.address: 10 Wedgwood Avenue, Newcastle under Lyme ST5 2JD

images.caption: William Nigel Jones with a campaign leaflet in his hand standing in front of a building.
